009 * (at your option) any later version.

012 * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
013 * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
014 * GNU General Public License for more details.

019package com.plotsquared.core.command;
020
021import com.plotsquared.core.PlotSquared;
022import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.Settings;
023import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.Caption;
024import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
025import com.plotsquared.core.database.DBFunc;
026import com.plotsquared.core.events.TeleportCause;
027import com.plotsquared.core.location.BlockLoc;
028import com.plotsquared.core.location.Location;
029import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;
030import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlotPlayer;
031import com.plotsquared.core.plot.Plot;
032import com.plotsquared.core.plot.PlotArea;
033import com.plotsquared.core.plot.PlotCluster;
034import com.plotsquared.core.plot.PlotId;
035import com.plotsquared.core.util.ComponentHelper;
036import com.plotsquared.core.util.Permissions;
037import com.plotsquared.core.util.TabCompletions;
038import com.plotsquared.core.util.query.PlotQuery;
039import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
040import net.kyori.adventure.text.format.NamedTextColor;
041import net.kyori.adventure.text.format.Style;
042import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.Tag;
043import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.resolver.TagResolver;
044
045import java.util.Collection;
046import java.util.Collections;
047import java.util.HashSet;
048import java.util.LinkedList;
049import java.util.List;
050import java.util.Set;
051import java.util.UUID;
052import java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException;
053import java.util.stream.Collectors;
054import java.util.stream.Stream;
055
056@CommandDeclaration(command = "cluster",
057        aliases = "clusters",
058        category = CommandCategory.ADMINISTRATION,
059        requiredType = RequiredType.NONE,
060        permission = "plots.cluster")
061public class Cluster extends SubCommand {
062
063    private static final Component[] AVAILABLE_ARGS = Stream.of(
064            "list", "create", "delete", "resize", "invite", "kick", "leave", "helpers", "tp", "sethome"
065    ).map(s -> Component.text(s).style(Style.style(NamedTextColor.DARK_AQUA))).toArray(Component[]::new);
066    private static final Component SEPARATOR = Component.text(", ").style(Style.style(NamedTextColor.GRAY));
067
068    // list, create, delete, resize, invite, kick, leave, helpers, tp, sethome
069    @Override
070    public boolean onCommand(PlotPlayer<?> player, String[] args) {
071        if (args.length == 0) {
072            // return arguments
073            player.sendMessage(
074                    TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_available_args"),
075                    TagResolver.resolver("list", Tag.inserting(ComponentHelper.join(AVAILABLE_ARGS, SEPARATOR)))
076            );
077            return false;
078        }
079        String sub = args[0].toLowerCase();
080        switch (sub) {
081            case "l":
082            case "list": {
083                if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_LIST)) {
084                    player.sendMessage(
085                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
086                            TagResolver.resolver(
087                                    "node",
088                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_LIST)
089                            )
090                    );
091                    return false;
092                }
093                if (args.length != 1) {
094                    player.sendMessage(
095                            TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
096                            TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot cluster list")))
097                    );
098                    return false;
099                }
100                PlotArea area = player.getApplicablePlotArea();
101                if (area == null) {
102                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot_world"));
103                    return false;
104                }
105                Set<PlotCluster> clusters = area.getClusters();
106                player.sendMessage(
107                        TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_list_heading"),
108                        TagResolver.resolver("amount", Tag.inserting(Component.text(clusters.size())))
109                );
110                for (PlotCluster cluster : clusters) {
111                    // Ignore unmanaged clusters
112                    String name = "'" + cluster.getName() + "' : " + cluster;
113                    if (player.getUUID().equals(cluster.owner)) {
114                        player.sendMessage(
115                                TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_list_element_owner"),
116                                TagResolver.resolver("cluster", Tag.inserting(Component.text(name)))
117                        );
118                    } else if (cluster.helpers.contains(player.getUUID())) {
119                        player.sendMessage(
120                                TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_list_element_helpers"),
121                                TagResolver.resolver("cluster", Tag.inserting(Component.text(name)))
122                        );
123                    } else if (cluster.invited.contains(player.getUUID())) {
124                        player.sendMessage(
125                                TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_list_element_invited"),
126                                TagResolver.resolver("cluster", Tag.inserting(Component.text(name)))
127                        );
128                    } else {
129                        player.sendMessage(
130                                TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_list_element"),
131                                TagResolver.resolver("cluster", Tag.inserting(Component.text(cluster.toString())))
132                        );
133                    }
134                }
135                return true;
136            }
137            case "c":
138            case "create": {
139                if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_CREATE)) {
140                    player.sendMessage(
141                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
142                            TagResolver.resolver(
143                                    "node",
144                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_CREATE)
145                            )
146                    );
147                    return false;
148                }
149                PlotArea area = player.getApplicablePlotArea();
150                if (area == null) {
151                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot_world"));
152                    return false;
153                }
154                if (args.length != 4) {
155                    player.sendMessage(
156                            TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
157                            TagResolver.resolver(
158                                    "value",
159                                    Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot cluster create <name> <id-bot> <id-top>"))
160                            )
161                    );
162                    return false;
163                }
164                int currentClusters = Settings.Limit.GLOBAL ?
165                        player.getClusterCount() :
166                        player.getPlotCount(player.getLocation().getWorldName());
167                if (currentClusters >= player.getAllowedPlots()) {
168                    player.sendMessage(
169                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.cant_claim_more_clusters"),
170                            TagResolver.resolver("amount", Tag.inserting(Component.text(player.getAllowedPlots())))
171                    );
172                }
173                PlotId pos1;
174                PlotId pos2;
175                // check pos1 / pos2
176                try {
177                    pos1 = PlotId.fromString(args[2]);
178                    pos2 = PlotId.fromString(args[3]);
179                } catch (IllegalArgumentException ignored) {
180                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("invalid.not_valid_plot_id"));
181                    return false;
182                }
183                // check if name is taken
184                String name = args[1];
185                if (area.getCluster(name) != null) {
186                    player.sendMessage(
187                            TranslatableCaption.of("alias.alias_is_taken"),
188                            TagResolver.resolver("alias", Tag.inserting(Component.text(name)))
189                    );
190                    return false;
191                }
192                if (pos2.getX() < pos1.getX() || pos2.getY() < pos1.getY()) {
193                    PlotId tmp = PlotId.of(Math.min(pos1.getX(), pos2.getX()), Math.min(pos1.getY(), pos2.getY()));
194                    pos2 = PlotId.of(Math.max(pos1.getX(), pos2.getX()), Math.max(pos1.getY(), pos2.getY()));
195                    pos1 = tmp;
196                }
197                //check if overlap
198                PlotCluster cluster = area.getFirstIntersectingCluster(pos1, pos2);
199                if (cluster != null) {
200                    player.sendMessage(
201                            TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_intersection"),
202                            TagResolver.resolver("cluster", Tag.inserting(Component.text(cluster.getName())))
203                    );
204                    return false;
205                }
206                // Check if it occupies existing plots
207                if (!area.contains(pos1) || !area.contains(pos2)) {
208                    player.sendMessage(
209                            TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_outside"),
210                            TagResolver.resolver("area", Tag.inserting(Component.text(area.toString())))
211                    );
212                    return false;
213                }
214                Set<Plot> plots = area.getPlotSelectionOwned(pos1, pos2);
215                if (!plots.isEmpty()) {
216                    if (!Permissions
217                            .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_CREATE_OTHER)) {
218                        UUID uuid = player.getUUID();
219                        for (Plot plot : plots) {
220                            if (!plot.isOwner(uuid)) {
221                                player.sendMessage(
222                                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
223                                        TagResolver.resolver(
224                                                "node",
225                                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_CREATE_OTHER)
226                                        )
227                                );
228                                return false;
229                            }
230                        }
231                    }
232                }
233                // Check allowed cluster size
234                cluster = new PlotCluster(area, pos1, pos2, player.getUUID());
235                int current;
236                if (Settings.Limit.GLOBAL) {
237                    current = player.getPlayerClusterCount();
238                } else {
239                    current = player.getPlayerClusterCount(player.getLocation().getWorldName());
240                }
241                int allowed = Permissions
242                        .hasPermissionRange(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_SIZE,
243                                Settings.Limit.MAX_PLOTS
244                        );
245                if (current + cluster.getArea() > allowed) {
246                    player.sendMessage(
247                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
248                            TagResolver.resolver(
249                                    "node",
250                                    Tag.inserting(Component.text(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_SIZE + "." + (current + cluster.getArea())))
251                            )
252                    );
253                    return false;
254                }
255                // create cluster
256                cluster.settings.setAlias(name);
257                area.addCluster(cluster);
258                DBFunc.createCluster(cluster);
259                // Add any existing plots to the current cluster
260                for (Plot plot : plots) {
261                    if (plot.hasOwner()) {
262                        if (!cluster.isAdded(plot.getOwner())) {
263                            cluster.invited.add(plot.getOwner());
264                            DBFunc.setInvited(cluster, plot.getOwner());
265                        }
266                    }
267                }
268                player.sendMessage(
269                        TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_created"),
270                        TagResolver.resolver("name", Tag.inserting(Component.text(name)))
271                );
272                return true;
273            }
274            case "disband":
275            case "del":
276            case "delete": {
277                if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_DELETE)) {
278                    player.sendMessage(
279                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
280                            TagResolver.resolver(
281                                    "node",
282                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_DELETE)
283                            )
284                    );
285                    return false;
286                }
287                if (args.length != 1 && args.length != 2) {
288                    player.sendMessage(
289                            TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
290                            TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot cluster delete [name]")))
291                    );
292                    return false;
293                }
294                PlotArea area = player.getApplicablePlotArea();
295                if (area == null) {
296                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot_world"));
297                    return false;
298                }
299                PlotCluster cluster;
300                if (args.length == 2) {
301                    cluster = area.getCluster(args[1]);
302                    if (cluster == null) {
303                        player.sendMessage(
304                                TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.invalid_cluster_name"),
305                                TagResolver.resolver("cluster", Tag.inserting(Component.text(args[1])))
306                        );
307                        return false;
308                    }
309                } else {
310                    cluster = area.getCluster(player.getLocation());
311                    if (cluster == null) {
312                        player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_cluster"));
313                        return false;
314                    }
315                }
316                if (!cluster.owner.equals(player.getUUID())) {
317                    if (!Permissions
318                            .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_DELETE_OTHER)) {
319                        player.sendMessage(
320                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
321                                TagResolver.resolver(
322                                        "node",
323                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_DELETE_OTHER)
324                                )
325                        );
326                        return false;
327                    }
328                }
329                DBFunc.delete(cluster);
330                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_deleted"), TagResolver.resolver(
331                        "cluster",
332                        Tag.inserting(Component.text(cluster.toString()))
333                ));
334                return true;
335            }
336            case "res":
337            case "resize": {
338                if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_RESIZE)) {
339                    player.sendMessage(
340                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
341                            TagResolver.resolver(
342                                    "node",
343                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_RESIZE)
344                            )
345                    );
346                    return false;
347                }
348                if (args.length != 3) {
349                    player.sendMessage(
350                            TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
351                            TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot cluster resize [name]")))
352                    );
353                    return false;
354                }
355                PlotId pos1;
356                PlotId pos2;
357                // check pos1 / pos2
358                try {
359                    pos1 = PlotId.fromString(args[2]);
360                    pos2 = PlotId.fromString(args[3]);
361                } catch (IllegalArgumentException ignored) {
362                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("invalid.not_valid_plot_id"));
363                    return false;
364                }
365                if (pos2.getX() < pos1.getX() || pos2.getY() < pos1.getY()) {
366                    pos1 = PlotId.of(Math.min(pos1.getX(), pos2.getX()), Math.min(pos1.getY(), pos2.getY()));
367                    pos2 = PlotId.of(Math.max(pos1.getX(), pos2.getX()), Math.max(pos1.getY(), pos2.getY()));
368                }
369                // check if in cluster
370                PlotArea area = player.getApplicablePlotArea();
371                if (area == null) {
372                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot_world"));
373                    return false;
374                }
375                PlotCluster cluster = area.getCluster(player.getLocation());
376                if (cluster == null) {
377                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_cluster"));
378                    return false;
379                }
380                if (!cluster.hasHelperRights(player.getUUID())) {
381                    if (!Permissions
382                            .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_RESIZE_OTHER)) {
383                        player.sendMessage(
384                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
385                                TagResolver.resolver(
386                                        "node",
387                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_RESIZE_OTHER)
388                                )
389                        );
390                        return false;
391                    }
392                }
393                //check if overlap
394                PlotCluster intersect = area.getFirstIntersectingCluster(pos1, pos2);
395                if (intersect != null) {
396                    player.sendMessage(
397                            TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_intersection"),
398                            TagResolver.resolver("cluster", Tag.inserting(Component.text(intersect.getName())))
399                    );
400                    return false;
401                }
402                Set<Plot> existing = area.getPlotSelectionOwned(cluster.getP1(), cluster.getP2());
403                Set<Plot> newPlots = area.getPlotSelectionOwned(pos1, pos2);
404                Set<Plot> removed = new HashSet<>(existing);
405
406                removed.removeAll(newPlots);
407                // Check expand / shrink
408                if (!removed.isEmpty()) {
409                    if (!Permissions
410                            .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_RESIZE_SHRINK)) {
411                        player.sendMessage(
412                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
413                                TagResolver.resolver(
414                                        "node",
415                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_RESIZE_SHRINK)
416                                )
417                        );
418                        return false;
419                    }
420                }
421                newPlots.removeAll(existing);
422                if (!newPlots.isEmpty()) {
423                    if (!Permissions
424                            .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_RESIZE_EXPAND)) {
425                        player.sendMessage(
426                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
427                                TagResolver.resolver(
428                                        "node",
429                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_RESIZE_EXPAND)
430                                )
431                        );
432                        return false;
433                    }
434                }
435                // Check allowed cluster size
436                int current;
437                if (Settings.Limit.GLOBAL) {
438                    current = player.getPlayerClusterCount();
439                } else {
440                    current = player.getPlayerClusterCount(player.getLocation().getWorldName());
441                }
442                current -= cluster.getArea() + (1 + pos2.getX() - pos1.getX()) * (1 + pos2.getY() - pos1.getY());
443                int allowed = Permissions.hasPermissionRange(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER,
444                        Settings.Limit.MAX_PLOTS
445                );
446                if (current + cluster.getArea() > allowed) {
447                    player.sendMessage(
448                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
449                            TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Component.text(
450                                    Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER + "." + (current + cluster.getArea())
451                            )))
452                    );
453                    return false;
454                }
455                // resize cluster
456                DBFunc.resizeCluster(cluster, pos1, pos2);
457                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_resized"));
458                return true;
459            }
460            case "add":
461            case "inv":
462            case "invite": {
463                if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_INVITE)) {
464                    player.sendMessage(
465                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
466                            TagResolver.resolver(
467                                    "node",
468                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_INVITE)
469                            )
470                    );
471                    return false;
472                }
473                if (args.length != 2) {
474                    player.sendMessage(
475                            TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
476                            TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot cluster invite <player>")))
477                    );
478                    return false;
479                }
480                // check if in cluster
481                PlotArea area = player.getApplicablePlotArea();
482                if (area == null) {
483                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot_world"));
484                }
485                PlotCluster cluster = area.getCluster(player.getLocation());
486                if (cluster == null) {
487                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_cluster"));
488                    return false;
489                }
490                if (!cluster.hasHelperRights(player.getUUID())) {
491                    if (!Permissions
492                            .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_INVITE_OTHER)) {
493                        player.sendMessage(
494                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
495                                TagResolver.resolver(
496                                        "node",
497                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_INVITE_OTHER)
498                                )
499                        );
500                        return false;
501                    }
502                }
503
504                PlotSquared.get().getImpromptuUUIDPipeline()
505                        .getSingle(args[1], (uuid, throwable) -> {
506                            if (throwable instanceof TimeoutException) {
507                                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("players.fetching_players_timeout"));
508                            } else if (throwable != null) {
509                                player.sendMessage(
510                                        TranslatableCaption.of("errors.invalid_player"),
511                                        TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(args[1])))
512                                );
513                            } else {
514                                if (!cluster.isAdded(uuid)) {
515                                    // add the user if not added
516                                    cluster.invited.add(uuid);
517                                    DBFunc.setInvited(cluster, uuid);
518                                    final PlotPlayer<?> otherPlayer =
519                                            PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().getPlayerIfExists(uuid);
520                                    if (otherPlayer != null) {
521                                        player.sendMessage(
522                                                TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_invited"),
523                                                TagResolver.resolver("cluster", Tag.inserting(Component.text(cluster.getName())))
524                                        );
525                                    }
526                                }
527                                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_added_user"));
528                            }
529                        });
530                return true;
531            }
532            case "k":
533            case "remove":
534            case "kick": {
535                if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_KICK)) {
536                    player.sendMessage(
537                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
538                            TagResolver.resolver(
539                                    "node",
540                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_KICK)
541                            )
542                    );
543                    return false;
544                }
545                if (args.length != 2) {
546                    player.sendMessage(
547                            TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
548                            TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot cluster kick <player>")))
549                    );
550                    return false;
551                }
552                PlotArea area = player.getApplicablePlotArea();
553                if (area == null) {
554                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot_world"));
555                }
556                PlotCluster cluster = area.getCluster(player.getLocation());
557                if (cluster == null) {
558                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_cluster"));
559                    return false;
560                }
561                if (!cluster.hasHelperRights(player.getUUID())) {
562                    if (!Permissions
563                            .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_KICK_OTHER)) {
564                        player.sendMessage(
565                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
566                                TagResolver.resolver(
567                                        "node",
568                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_KICK_OTHER)
569                                )
570                        );
571                        return false;
572                    }
573                }
574                // check uuid
575                PlotSquared.get().getImpromptuUUIDPipeline()
576                        .getSingle(args[1], (uuid, throwable) -> {
577                            if (throwable instanceof TimeoutException) {
578                                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("players.fetching_players_timeout"));
579                            } else if (throwable != null) {
580                                player.sendMessage(
581                                        TranslatableCaption.of("errors.invalid_player"),
582                                        TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(args[1])))
583                                );
584                            } else {
585                                // Can't kick if the player is yourself, the owner, or not added to the cluster
586                                if (uuid.equals(player.getUUID()) || uuid.equals(cluster.owner)
587                                        || !cluster.isAdded(uuid)) {
588                                    player.sendMessage(
589                                            TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cannot_kick_player"),
590                                            TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(cluster.getName())))
591                                    );
592                                } else {
593                                    if (cluster.helpers.contains(uuid)) {
594                                        cluster.helpers.remove(uuid);
595                                        DBFunc.removeHelper(cluster, uuid);
596                                    }
597                                    cluster.invited.remove(uuid);
598                                    DBFunc.removeInvited(cluster, uuid);
599
600                                    final PlotPlayer<?> player2 =
601                                            PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().getPlayerIfExists(uuid);
602                                    if (player2 != null) {
603                                        player.sendMessage(
604                                                TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_removed"),
605                                                TagResolver.resolver("cluster", Tag.inserting(Component.text(cluster.getName())))
606                                        );
607                                    }
608                                    removePlayerPlots(cluster, uuid, player2.getLocation().getWorldName());
609                                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_kicked_user"));
610                                }
611                            }
612                        });
613                return true;
614            }
615            case "quit":
616            case "leave": {
617                if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_LEAVE)) {
618                    player.sendMessage(
619                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
620                            TagResolver.resolver(
621                                    "node",
622                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_LEAVE)
623                            )
624                    );
625                    return false;
626                }
627                if (args.length != 1 && args.length != 2) {
628                    player.sendMessage(
629                            TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
630                            TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot cluster leave [name]")))
631                    );
632                    return false;
633                }
634                PlotArea area = player.getApplicablePlotArea();
635                if (area == null) {
636                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot_world"));
637                }
638                PlotCluster cluster;
639                if (args.length == 2) {
640                    cluster = area.getCluster(args[1]);
641                    if (cluster == null) {
642                        player.sendMessage(
643                                TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.invalid_cluster_name"),
644                                TagResolver.resolver("cluster", Tag.inserting(Component.text(args[1])))
645                        );
646                        return false;
647                    }
648                } else {
649                    cluster = area.getCluster(player.getLocation());
650                    if (cluster == null) {
651                        player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_cluster"));
652                        return false;
653                    }
654                }
655                UUID uuid = player.getUUID();
656                if (!cluster.isAdded(uuid)) {
657                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_not_added"));
658                    return false;
659                }
660                if (uuid.equals(cluster.owner)) {
661                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_cannot_leave"));
662                    return false;
663                }
664                if (cluster.helpers.contains(uuid)) {
665                    cluster.helpers.remove(uuid);
666                    DBFunc.removeHelper(cluster, uuid);
667                }
668                cluster.invited.remove(uuid);
669                DBFunc.removeInvited(cluster, uuid);
670                player.sendMessage(
671                        TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_removed"),
672                        TagResolver.resolver("cluster", Tag.inserting(Component.text(cluster.getName())))
673                );
674                removePlayerPlots(cluster, uuid, player.getLocation().getWorldName());
675                return true;
676            }
677            case "members": {
678                if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_HELPERS)) {
679                    player.sendMessage(
680                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
681                            TagResolver.resolver(
682                                    "node",
683                                    Tag.inserting(Component.text(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_HELPERS.toString()))
684                            )
685                    );
686                    return false;
687                }
688                if (args.length != 3) {
689                    player.sendMessage(
690                            TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
691                            TagResolver.resolver(
692                                    "value",
693                                    Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot cluster members <add | remove> <player>"))
694                            )
695                    );
696                    return false;
697                }
698                PlotArea area = player.getApplicablePlotArea();
699                if (area == null) {
700                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot_world"));
701                }
702                PlotCluster cluster = area.getCluster(player.getLocation());
703                if (cluster == null) {
704                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_cluster"));
705                    return false;
706                }
707
708                PlotSquared.get().getImpromptuUUIDPipeline()
709                        .getSingle(args[2], (uuid, throwable) -> {
710                            if (throwable instanceof TimeoutException) {
711                                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("players.fetching_players_timeout"));
712                            } else if (throwable != null) {
713                                player.sendMessage(
714                                        TranslatableCaption.of("errors.invalid_player"),
715                                        TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(args[2])))
716                                );
717                            } else {
718                                if (args[1].equalsIgnoreCase("add")) {
719                                    cluster.helpers.add(uuid);
720                                    DBFunc.setHelper(cluster, uuid);
721                                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_added_helper"));
722                                } else if (args[1].equalsIgnoreCase("remove")) {
723                                    cluster.helpers.remove(uuid);
724                                    DBFunc.removeHelper(cluster, uuid);
725                                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_removed_helper"));
726                                } else {
727                                    player.sendMessage(
728                                            TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
729                                            TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(
730                                                    "/plot cluster members <add | remove> <player>"
731                                            )))
732                                    );
733                                }
734                            }
735                        });
736                return true;
737            }
738            case "spawn":
739            case "home":
740            case "tp": {
741                if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_TP)) {
742                    player.sendMessage(
743                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
744                            TagResolver.resolver(
745                                    "node",
746                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_TP)
747                            )
748                    );
749                    return false;
750                }
751                if (args.length != 2) {
752                    player.sendMessage(
753                            TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
754                            TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot cluster tp <name>")))
755                    );
756                    return false;
757                }
758                PlotArea area = player.getApplicablePlotArea();
759                if (area == null) {
760                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot_world"));
761                    return false;
762                }
763                PlotCluster cluster = area.getCluster(args[1]);
764                if (cluster == null) {
765                    player.sendMessage(
766                            TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.invalid_cluster_name"),
767                            TagResolver.resolver("cluster", Tag.inserting(Component.text(args[1])))
768                    );
769                    return false;
770                }
771                UUID uuid = player.getUUID();
772                if (!cluster.isAdded(uuid)) {
773                    if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_TP_OTHER)) {
774                        player.sendMessage(
775                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
776                                TagResolver.resolver(
777                                        "node",
778                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_TP_OTHER)
779                                )
780                        );
781                        return false;
782                    }
783                }
784                cluster.getHome(home -> player.teleport(home, TeleportCause.COMMAND_CLUSTER_TELEPORT));
785                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_teleporting"));
786                return true;
787            }
788            case "i":
789            case "info":
790            case "show":
791            case "information": {
792                if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_INFO)) {
793                    player.sendMessage(
794                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
795                            TagResolver.resolver(
796                                    "node",
797                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_TP)
798                            )
799                    );
800                    return false;
801                }
802                if (args.length != 1 && args.length != 2) {
803                    player.sendMessage(
804                            TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
805                            TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot cluster info [name]")))
806                    );
807                }
808                PlotArea area = player.getApplicablePlotArea();
809                if (area == null) {
810                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot_world"));
811                    return false;
812                }
813                PlotCluster cluster;
814                if (args.length == 2) {
815                    cluster = area.getCluster(args[1]);
816                    if (cluster == null) {
817                        player.sendMessage(
818                                TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.invalid_cluster_name"),
819                                TagResolver.resolver("cluster", Tag.inserting(Component.text(args[1])))
820                        );
821                        return false;
822                    }
823                } else {
824                    cluster = area.getCluster(player.getLocation());
825                    if (cluster == null) {
826                        player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_cluster"));
827                        return false;
828                    }
829                }
830                String id = cluster.toString();
831
832                PlotSquared.get().getImpromptuUUIDPipeline()
833                        .getSingle(cluster.owner, (username, throwable) -> {
834                            if (throwable instanceof TimeoutException) {
835                                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("players.fetching_players_timeout"));
836                            } else {
837                                final String owner;
838                                if (username == null) {
839                                    owner = "unknown";
840                                } else {
841                                    owner = username;
842                                }
843                                String name = cluster.getName();
844                                String size = (cluster.getP2().getX() - cluster.getP1().getX() + 1) + "x" + (
845                                        cluster.getP2().getY() - cluster.getP1().getY() + 1);
846                                String rights = cluster.isAdded(player.getUUID()) + "";
847                                Caption message = TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_info");
848                                TagResolver resolver = TagResolver.builder()
849                                        .tag("id", Tag.inserting(Component.text(id)))
850                                        .tag("owner", Tag.inserting(Component.text(owner)))
851                                        .tag("name", Tag.inserting(Component.text(name)))
852                                        .tag("size", Tag.inserting(Component.text(size)))
853                                        .tag("rights", Tag.inserting(Component.text(rights)))
854                                        .build();
855                                player.sendMessage(message, resolver);
856                            }
857                        });
858                return true;
859            }
860            case "sh":
861            case "setspawn":
862            case "sethome": {
863                if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_SETHOME)) {
864                    player.sendMessage(
865                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
866                            TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_SETHOME))
867                    );
868                    return false;
869                }
870                if (args.length != 1 && args.length != 2) {
871                    player.sendMessage(
872                            TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
873                            TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot cluster sethome")))
874                    );
875                    return false;
876                }
877                PlotArea area = player.getApplicablePlotArea();
878                if (area == null) {
879                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot_world"));
880                }
881                PlotCluster cluster = area.getCluster(player.getLocation());
882                if (cluster == null) {
883                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_cluster"));
884                    return false;
885                }
886                if (!cluster.hasHelperRights(player.getUUID())) {
887                    if (!Permissions
888                            .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_SETHOME_OTHER)) {
889                        player.sendMessage(
890                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
891                                TagResolver.resolver(
892                                        "node",
893                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_SETHOME_OTHER)
894                                )
895                        );
896                        return false;
897                    }
898                }
899                Location base = cluster.getClusterBottom();
900                Location relative = player.getLocation().subtract(base.getX(), 0, base.getZ());
901                BlockLoc blockloc = new BlockLoc(relative.getX(), relative.getY(), relative.getZ());
902                cluster.settings.setPosition(blockloc);
903                DBFunc.setPosition(
904                        cluster,
905                        relative.getX() + "," + relative.getY() + "," + relative.getZ()
906                );
907                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("position.position_set"));
908                return true;
909            }
910        }
911        player.sendMessage(
912                TranslatableCaption.of("cluster.cluster_available_args"),
913                TagResolver.resolver("list", Tag.inserting(ComponentHelper.join(AVAILABLE_ARGS, SEPARATOR)))
914        );
915        return false;
916    }
917
918    private void removePlayerPlots(final PlotCluster cluster, final UUID uuid, final String world) {
919        for (final Plot plot : PlotQuery.newQuery().inWorld(world).ownedBy(uuid)) {
920            PlotCluster current = plot.getCluster();
921            if (current != null && current.equals(cluster)) {
922                if (plot.getOwners().size() == 1) {
923                    plot.unclaim();
924                } else {
925                    for (UUID newOwner : plot.getOwners()) {
926                        if (!newOwner.equals(uuid)) {
927                            plot.setOwner(newOwner);
928                            break;
929                        }
930                    }
931                }
932            }
933        }
934    }
935
936    @Override
937    public Collection<Command> tab(final PlotPlayer<?> player, final String[] args, final boolean space) {
938        if (args.length == 1) {
939            final List<String> completions = new LinkedList<>();
940            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_LIST)) {
941                completions.add("list");
942            }
943            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_CREATE)) {
944                completions.add("create");
945            }
946            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_DELETE)) {
947                completions.add("delete");
948            }
949            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_RESIZE)) {
950                completions.add("resize");
951            }
952            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_INVITE)) {
953                completions.add("invite");
954            }
955            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_KICK)) {
956                completions.add("kick");
957            }
958            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_KICK)) {
959                completions.add("leave");
960            }
961            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_HELPERS)) {
962                completions.add("members");
963            }
964            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_INFO)) {
965                completions.add("info");
966            }
967            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_TP)) {
968                completions.add("tp");
969            }
970            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER_SETHOME)) {
971                completions.add("sethome");
972            }
973            final List<Command> commands = completions.stream().filter(completion -> completion
974                            .toLowerCase()
975                            .startsWith(args[0].toLowerCase()))
976                    .map(completion -> new Command(
977                            null,
978                            true,
979                            completion,
980                            "",
981                            RequiredType.NONE,
982                            CommandCategory.ADMINISTRATION
983                    ) {
984                    }).collect(Collectors.toCollection(LinkedList::new));
985            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_CLUSTER) && args[0].length() > 0) {
986                commands.addAll(TabCompletions.completePlayers(player, args[0], Collections.emptyList()));
987            }
988            return commands;
989        }
990        return TabCompletions.completePlayers(player, String.join(",", args).trim(), Collections.emptyList());
991    }
992
993}
